greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations of [n] whose lengths of increasing runs are distinct squares.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
maple: g:= (n, s)-> `if`(n in s or not issqr(n), 0, 1):
b:= proc(u, o, t, s) option remember; `if`(u+o=0, g(t, s),
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 28 2018
